p.k: With 'Red Earth', American singer Dee Dee Bridgewater goes on a Malian journey that merges and melds all borders. She brings her own experiences as an African-American woman back to the motherland, resulting in a fusion of feeling, visions, and music.
p.d: Singer Dee Dee Bridgewater walks in with considerable credentials, but this documentary related to her album 'Red Earth' trumps them all: Red Earth is a Malian journey that merges and melts all borders. While world-beat listeners will recognize the grooves, this is Bridgewater's first time bringing her own experiences as an African-American woman back to the motherland. It results in a fusion of feeling, visions, and music.
